Don't size up. I don't know if the reviews said to do that or not, I did and ended up looking like a frumpy purple pirate 😫😂 otherwise it looks like the picture. I'm not sure if a smaller size would have looked nicer.
Not the same color or texture of material that was shown very thin but soft the collar is not stiff whatsoever…go a size below still good for 40 dollars but not what I wanted in the end

Took out of the plastic and the button immediately fell off. Other than that, fits as expected and was shipped fast. Nice top. May order more... will just have to sew the buttons on better.

I’m so glad I took everyone’s advice and sized down. Even the red coloring gives this such a lord of the rings vibe. It’s not what I was originally going for (circus vibe) but I’m absolutely keeping it. I love it! It is on the thinner side but that’s nice in the summer in the deserts.

This jacket will serve its purpose for a costume I am putting together but I would not recommend it for regular wear as the material is very thin and lacks any stretch. The sizing is accurate. I wear a 2x in regular local store bought clothes and ordered the 2x of this. I am larger up top and the button buttons without pulling the fabric. Just a shame the fabric is so incredibly thin.

It came in late soo i didn’t have time to return it and wait for a new one so I did modify it to fit. Also the collar didn’t actually stay up. Had to modify that to. Very thin material.
I ordered this to wear with leggings and knee high boots.  I absolutely love this piece! Comfortable to wear, washed and hung up to dry in perfect shape! Love love love this!

评论概述: This is not made for a fit frame
评论详情: I had to check and make sure I didn’t get the wrong size, but no, this thing is a tent on me, the shoulders and length are correct but that is it, no structure to the piece, no stiffening and the collar to keep shape, no pinching at waist, bad stitching, not as described

评论概述: Absurdly huge - don’t trust the sizing
评论详情: The statement “runs large” doesn’t even begin to cover it.  I ordered a size down per the reviews I read.  I should have ordered three or four sizes down.  Oh wait.  I couldn’t  because there’s only two sizes that are smaller than the size 8 I ordered.  For reference, it’s 39” in the waist!  39!  The sizing shows that a size 8 fits someone with a 40” bust.  The bust measurement of the garment I received is 44”.  While the style is attractive enough, the fabric is much too lightweight for a jacket.  Also, the color is not as pictured.  The green shows up on the webpage as being more of a dark teal green and also is described as such in several reviews.  The one I received is more hunter green.  I am definitely returning this and looking for something else.  Extra info: it’s quite long.  Im 5’6” and the back comes down to my knees.
I really like it but it is too big.  I use a belt and need to move the button.  But otherwise I really like it!

I am 5'4" and @138 pounds. Normally, I would wear a size 8 pant or dress. After reading the reviews on this item, I cautiously ordered a size 6. It is huge. A size 2 would have probably been a better fit. Thankfully, it came with an extra button and I have a sewing machine. I plan to add a second button about 4 inches from the first to make the waist more form fitting. I am a music director and this jacket top will work perfectly for our "Greatest Showmen" concert.

评论概述: Glad I got the size smaller!
评论详情: It’s a great piece for my cosplay purposes. Lightweight and stretchy, but they DEFINITELY run large! I usually wear an 8 on a good day, and I hesitated to get the 6, but when it came in I’m so glad I did! It fit nearly perfectly, and was even still a little loose in the waist.

评论概述: Not super excited but the cut is cute
评论详情: I'm busty so I ordered XXL to make sure I had space and I used the size chart given. It still fit oddly loose on top and tight at the waist.  I have a short torso as well so it sits high for some reason.  This would be great on long torso's and small to medium breast sizes.  I have to fold the collar down so it will sit better on my chest and shoulders.  I added a wide belt on the outside of the Jacket top to make up for the weird fit. It looks great with the belt. But the style is super cute and fits the exact look I wanted.  I wished it fit better without the belt, but oh well. I made it work.
Runs LARGE - but otherwise is EXCELLENT! Buy 1 size smaller

This jacket was perfect to go with my outfit I was putting together. My only complaint is it definitely needs to have more than one button. It did come with one extra button so I used it and sewed on a hidden snap to keep it from opening where it shouldn’t.
I ordered a US 4, which is my usual size. I'm 5'1" 120lbs. This was huge on me. More like an 8 or 10. The waist, the bust, everything was too large.
Looked like a sleek vampy jacket.  Fabric is too thin, sized too large, just looks sloppy.  In fact, the entire piece is an unappealing, sack-like travesty.  Spend your money elsewhere.

If you are getting this for a cheap costume, it works fine.  However, if you are expecting to wear this as part of an actual outfit, it is awful!  Very thin, wrinkled material... people thought it was homemade.  Fits oddly, too; it's like it was the right size, but still doesn't sit right.
I don't like the quality...I thought it was heavier...it's too light for me
I love it! Fit perfect and was so comfortable.
Drop dead gorgeous!!! Fits beautifully and looks fantastic paired with tea length skirts or dresses and jeans.

评论概述: Not for tall ladies - order a size smaller
评论详情: The material was nice - I wear a 14-16 so I ordered the Xl - Leary of the suggested sizing - and it was way to big.  This was with it penned underneath it was also a little too short on me.  I am going to have to do some alterations and will add lace to achieve desired length...

My wedding dress was a size 10, so I figured an 8 would do, based on reviews. I'm 5ft7in, and 160 pounds, 36b Bra size, and the 8 was still too big. My natural waist is about a 32inch around, and my hips between 38, 40in depending on the time of the month. It was a bit big on me- I gave the beautiful garment to my younger sister who is quite a bit more endowed than me, and it fit her perfectly. She was excited to receive the gift.  If youre build is simmilar to mine, but you have a DD cup or above, this will fit you fairly well. Beautiful garment, just made a bit big.... Though I should also say, curvy.  Will have to buy the 6 at a later date. Beautiful garment, well made for the price... Just a bit big. Little women be advised this may not be a product for you. Curvy girls, this is definitely your cut that will flatter you beautifully.  Truely yours, a puzzled puzzle piece girl.

评论概述: Love it but very big on me.
评论详情: Very cute but large. I sized down and it was still too big. It is stretchy so if you go 2 sizes down you will have a contouring fit. I  ordered an 8 but 6 wiuld probably be better.

I’m a size 6, 125lbs, 36 inch bust, and 5’3”. This jacket was more like a size 12. The sizing is way off. I am devastated because even going down to what they call a 4 will still be too big. I love the style so much. I wish they made it smaller. I had to return it sadly.
Cheap costume like fabric.  Lines and contours are horrendous.  Sizing is way off.  Sent back and ordered scarlet darkness
Great product

I love the material and the design, unfortunately, it came without the bottom, just a bit disappointed but worthy

I love this jacket. I bought it for a pirate costume poker run in July and can’t wait to wear it. Fabric is fairly light weight. Definitely more of a summer piece.  Quality is very well made.  I gave 5 stars however, the jacket runs extremely large. I’m 5’3”, 140 pounds and normally wear a size 8. Bought a size 6 and it’s more like a size 12!  Size down at least two sizes and your golden.
This product is great quality.  It's beautiful and sexy!!
It doesn’t fit like it looks in the picture. Too loose. I’m having it taken in.

The fabric is nice and the work quality is really good!  For the price you can't go wrong.  GREAT for Mardi Gras!

评论概述: Perfect Fit But The Button Is Very Strange
评论详情: I love everything about this jacket, super comfortable, and flexible for what you can wear with it for the right effect and look that you want to give off.  While yes, it's designed for steam punk, it's classy enough to wear to work, wear to business conferences, and to make a general fashion statement where appropriate.  The only thing I didn't like about the jacket is it comes overly rinkled so have an iron ready.  The button is also barely sewed on, and mine came right off when putting it on the first time.  I had to resew the button on but, it was an easy fix for me.  Would still most definitely recommend this because the button is a super easy fix and the jacket looks great with slacks, jeans, skirts, or to have a steampunk or fantasy gothic moment.  Well worth the buy.  While this was meant to be apart of a halloween costume, I find myself wearing it frequently.
Very cheap, flimsy fabric at least 2 sizes too large. Not quite a scam but a very bad deal.
Just ok but ran out of time so had to wear it

The quality of this was nice but it was too big. I actually bought a size down and it was still too big. The way it's constructed prevented me from being able to change it myself. So it had to go back:0(
Beautiful Top, I wish I would have ordered a little larger, comments from previous said it ran big, but mine was a little smaller then I wished.  Still worked out for me.  Love it.

In my experience this looked way better online than in person.  The first problem I had was that the button fell off as soon as I took the vest out of the package.  It ran big (like very big - if I were ordering again I'd go down a size), and had areas where it didn't hang quite right because of the way it was sewn.  The color was beautiful, but the fabric was not high quality.  Overall I'd say this garment would be fine for a costume, but not good for daily wear.

Looks really great and lightweight. Perfect for costume parties. I wear a size 16 pant and got US18 size. It’s a bit tight at the waist but can be covered with a waist belt. It’s also cute left unbuttoned. I love the collar and the shoulders.

This jacket is very thin, I thought it would be thicker for the price but it’s a very thin, silky material. In my option, not worth the $46 they are charging. My garment had the number 18 in chalk on it on both sides too. Very odd.

Cheaply made. Uncomfortable fabric. Mine was missing the button and came with a safety pin. Kept it cuz I planned on removing the button anyway. Good for my one night costume, but definitely not good if you want it as an everyday piece of clothing.

So I read the reviews before ordering and ordered 1 size down.... I'm a 16 -18 and the 14 was perfect.  The material is soft and flowy and I would definitely recommend it.  Using this for my female joker costume.

评论概述: Not a good product for the price.

The fabric is thin and cheap, which worked out well for the outdoor summer event I needed it for, but in general, it is too expensive for the price and quality. The collar needs some heavy interfacing in order to stand up.  If it were $15-20, I would rate it higher and probably buy a couple in other colors.
Typical made-in-China junk.

After reading reviews (and seeing they were out of my size) I went ahead and ordered smaller. Normally I'm an 8/10, the 4 fits. It's definitely a tight button, but I wasnt going to close it for my costume anyway. Fabric is thin, but I plan on searching the collar to make it stay standing. For the price I would order again.

Definetly read the reviews- go down two sizes, if you can! Even then, it fits in some places, but I had to move the button for this piece to work as shown in the picture. Once that was done, I added some buttons and trim, and this made the cutest addition to my Steampunk outfit for Halloween.

Listen to the reviews on size,l (runs big),  I did and it fit... Normally I am 8/10 M to L... I got this in a 4 and it fits and could still be  taken in a inch or so material is stretchy too,, it is thinner then I expected.  It is a nice piece and works for my outfit, I would buy again.

This item is made from cheap material and did not lay right.  The color was an odd cross between purple and red.  I did not keep it.  Returning it was not a hassle.
This jacket is gorgeous. 👍 Sizes do run a little large, so if you're typically an XL, an L should do you.
As per other reviews, this is huge. I bought extra buttons and made it double breasted.

Ordered a size larger just to be safe. Well when I tried it on the front overlapped the buttons so too big.  I decided not to reorder a smaller size as the garment just appears to be cheaply constructed.  Opted for a refund.

Cheap material, way too big sizing. But it worked. Not as I had hoped but ok. But too expensive.
This would be very cute, but it was way too big.

As other reviewers said, the fit is about 2 sizes too large, however, I was able to move not only the front fastening button but the back two buttons over the strap to improve the fit. I ordered the smallest size available, US4. A 4 is typically a good fit for me. Didn't actually have to remove one of the buttons as it just fell off as I opened the package! The fabric is also really thin and I had to starch the collar a lot to keep it up as pictured. It's a really cute design, I just wish the sizing was better and it was constructed from thicker fabric.

I'm a size 18, and i bought the 16. It was still too big, so went back to buy the 14 and it fits great. This material is super thin, but I am good with that since I live in Texas. i bought the red and teal. I put the teal and on and my husband said it looked like something I would normally wear - minus the sleeves- I don't do sleeveless. I bought these as part of a renaissance period costume, and it is exactly what I wanted.  Thinking about buying the royal blue to have to wear just because- I would sew some lace sleeves or something.

评论概述: Too large.... more like Real women sizes
评论详情: I saw on reviews that it ran large. I say that it fits perfect for real sized women. This is my second ever Clothing item that I bought through Amazon. The first item i got  I purposely ordered in a larger size in hopes that it would fit but it still didn’t. The description on this item though said that it runs large and I ordered my actual size and it fit perfectly. I love the cut and the style and how it hangs off of you. definitely recommend

Not sure how this was supposed to fit honestly. All the reviews said it was way too big. My measurements are 38-30-46 I ordered a size 10. It fit me well. No lining on this vest is the only reason I gave 4 stars. Still pretty nice.

评论概述: A bit large, but very cute design.
评论详情: The design of this top is great. It just doesn't fit as the fit guide suggests.

评论概述: Super cute, nice quality—but WAY WAY WAY TOO BIG
评论详情: I wish I could give this product 5 stars, and based solely on the quality and design, I would rate it highly. The dealbreaker is how huge it is. I ordered the smallest option, and it was just way too big. You definitely can move the button (as one reviewer mentioned), but the one I got was too big even for that. I got the equivalent of a size 4, which is what I wear in most dresses (a 4 or a 6 usually). This was probably like a size 10 or 12. For reference, I am 5’9”, around 140#, and size 28 waist. The jacket is super cute otherwise!
This is a lovely jacket. It fits as expected, and the color is accurate. I would have loved to have been able to keep and wear it, but the product came damaged. Luckily the return was seamless.

I love this “coat”. It is incredibly light weight fabric. It does run REALLY big. I am on the edge of a size 10 but not quite a 12 and size 10 was pretty big on me. But I was prepared for that since all the reviews warned me. I sew so I easily took it in on the sides. If I didn’t sew I would not have been as relaxed but it was fine. Can’t wait to wear it to the “Mad Hatters Ball” coming up. I bought Black so that it could continue to be worn with jeans for other occasions. I am very happy.
It's way over priced. The fabric is super cheap and fits way too big. I'm going to have to make alterations to this to tighten it up.

This blazer seems like it could be cute on but it’s hard to tell with the sizing. I would say this runs pretty large. I usually wear a medium or 8 in tops due to bra size but this seemed to run 1-2 sizes too large. If you are short or petite this likely will. It fall correctly to look flattering. If this came in petite sizes I may considering ordering again. The quality was okay and the color (burgundy) was nice.

评论概述: Really well made and pretty, but giant
评论详情: Really well made and pretty, but giant. I'm a size 6, and the size 4 was 3 sizes too large.

评论概述: I wanted to love this item and I still love the *pattern* but ...
评论详情: I wanted to love this item and I still love the *pattern* but the garment itself is made from cheap, slinky material.  I had to iron it 3 times to remove all the wrinkles.  Because it is not lined and made of slinky, stretchy fabric it's very difficult to get the neckline and collar to it sit right.  This garment would be much improved it they made it of a heavier weight fabric that did not stretch.  If you want it for costuming you can modify it if you sew.  I took up about 1 inch from each side of the waist and also adjusted the back to make the waist fit better.  I think it would look better with corseting and a tie at the back.  I may try starching it to get it to lay better and not flop around which exposes the seams since it is not lined.  And some of the sewing is substandard.  If you want to wear it with no alteration it's not the best choice.

评论概述: Very large but the style is cute
评论详情: So yes as all the reviewers say, it runs veryyyy big. I ordered the smallest size which is a 4 but it is just way too big everywhere. I would say it's about 4 sizes bigger than it should be. The neck, arm holes, everything was just too large. There is about 4 inches of gaping fabric on each side of my waist. The quality was also disappointing for the price, it is very thin material and is completely unlined as you see in the pictures. It should cost $14 not $46. The only reason I gave it 3 stars is because the style is seriously adorable. I wish it could have worked for me because it is truly a unique top. For reference I am 118lbs 5'5" measurements 34-26-38.
I love the style, but it is a bit on the small side.  I plan on keeping it as I am losing weight!  It should fit in no time.
worked well for cosume
This is a fun piece of clothing!  I used it for an 80's night and went as Prince.
